effect.shortEffect: Changes this Pokémon's type to match its held Memory.
effect.full: Changes this Pokémon's type to match its held Memory. This ability cannot be copied, replaced, or nullified. This ability only takes effect for Silvally.

description.sun-moon: Changes the Pokémon’s type to match the memory disc it holds.
description.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Changes the Pokémon’s type to match the memory disc it holds.
description.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Changes the Pokémon’s type to match the memory disc it holds.
description.sword-shield: Changes the Pokémon’s type to match the memory disc it holds.
